thread.title: Prince Harry 'to move girlfriend Meghan Markle into Kensington Palace apartment - and he's in a hurry'
thread.title_full: Prince Harry 'to move girlfriend Meghan Markle into Kensington Palace apartment - and he's in a hurry'

author: Steve Robson
title: Prince Harry 'to move girlfriend Meghan Markle into Kensington Palace apartment - and he's in a hurry'
text:
Meghan Markle is prepared to give up acting and settled down with Harry, it has been claimed (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get celebs   
Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are to take the next step and move in together - next door to his brother William, according to reports. 
The couple have been seeing each other for almost a year and friends believe marriage is on the cards. 
And in a further indication things are getting serious, the prince, 32, wants Meghan, 35, to move in with him into a Kensington Palace. 
His brother Prince William, wife Kate and their two children Prince George and Princess Charlotte are due to move back to London later this year. 
William is giving up his job as an air ambulance pilot to take on increased royal duties. Prince Harry wants Meghan to move in with him, it has been reported (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Both princes will move back into Kensington Palace this year, it is believed (Photo: Getty Images Europe) 
And according to the Daily Mail, Harry and Meghan will move into an apartment which is being renovated next door. 
A source told the paper loved-up Harry appears keen for to settle down as soon as possible. 
"He keeps popping round and asking when it will be ready," the source said. 
"He seems in a real hurry to move in with Meghan." 
It comes amid reports Harry was forced to give up a skiing trip after his brother William was caught dad-dancing on a boozy lads holiday. 
Earlier this month, Harry attended his best friend's wedding in Jamaica with his girlfriend Meghan . 
And he is said to have hoped to catch up with the couple – Tom 'Skippy' Inskip and his new wife Lara Hughes-Young – when they go skiiing in Zermatt. Prince Harry has reportedly had to cancel his own skiing trip (Photo: PA) 
But now – after his brother's antics in the nearby posh Swiss resort of Verbier – Harry has reportedly had to rethink his plans. 
"Everyone was expecting him, but he'd be mad to be seen here after the furore his brother created," a source said. 
Kensington Palace declined to comment. 
Last week, Prince William was spotted partying the night away at a club in Verbier during a lads' holiday in the posh ski resort, and was caught on camera busting out some seriously old-skool moves. 
TMZ reported that the prince went clubbing with some friends when a fellow reveller grabbed the footage of the happy royal. Prince William had fun in Verbier (Photo: Getty Images Europe) He was caught on camera dancing in a club (Photo: Getty Images) 
He'd left wife Kate Middleton and children Prince George and Princess Charlotte back home in the UK for the all-boys holiday to the upmarket Swiss ski resort, where he'd earlier been spotted downing Jagerbombs at a boozy lunch. 
He and his friends had met up with Australian model Sophie Taylor and her pal for the liquid lunch, and was photographed giving her a high-five over a table full of drinks. Read More Sophie with her boyfriend, who also claims to have met Prince William on his ski trip (Photo: Facebook) Sophie was papped high-fiving the prince (Photo: Facebook) 
Due to his holiday, Wills had missed out on yesterday's Commonwealth Day service at Westminster Abbey to go skiing. 
Most of the other Royals, including his brother Prince Harry, turned up to celebrate the Queen sending off the commemorative baton with a message of goodwill to the other Commonwealth nations it will visit ahead of the Commonwealth Games in 2018. Like us on Facebook
